product.name: Product Name
product.type: product category (hardware, food, tech, fashion, etc.)
product.material: primary material (aluminum, plastic, wood, fabric, etc.)

components.position: where it is on the product

lighting.style: professional product photography | natural light | dramatic | soft | studio | etc.

primary_light.position: 45 degrees from upper left | upper right | directly above | etc.
primary_light.softness: hard light | softbox diffused | umbrella diffused | window diffused

fill_light.position: opposite side from key light | right side | left side
fill_light.purpose: reduce shadows, maintain depth, lift dark areas

rim_light.type: rim light | back light | edge light
rim_light.position: behind and above product | behind and to side
rim_light.purpose: edge definition, separate from background, add dimension

practical_lights.description: lights that are part of the product itself (LED displays, underglow, etc.)

composition.camera_angle: 3/4 view from slightly above | straight-on | overhead | eye-level | low angle | high angle
composition.camera_height: degrees above or below product (e.g., 15-20 degrees)
composition.framing: how much of frame the product fills (50% | 60-70% | 80%)
composition.negative_space: empty space for text/copy (30% top-right | 40% left side | etc.)
composition.depth_of_field: f/1.8-f/2.8 (very shallow) | f/4-f/5.6 (moderate) | f/8-f/11 (deep) | f/16+ (everything sharp)

surface.type: what the product sits on (wood desk | marble | concrete | glass | fabric | etc.)
surface.texture: smooth | wood grain | rough | polished | matte
surface.lighting_interaction: how light plays on the surface (reflections | shadows | highlights)

background.type: solid color | gradient | blurred environment | studio cyc wall | natural scene
background.depth: how far behind product (2-3 feet | 5-10 feet | infinity)
background.content: what's in the background (if blurred environment)
background.blur_amount: sharp | slight blur | heavy blur | complete blur (bokeh)

props.position: foreground | middle-ground | background | left side | right side
props.visibility: fully visible | partially visible | out of focus

glow.description: soft light emanating from product or lights

reflections.surface_reflections: how product reflects on surface (minimal | subtle | strong)
reflections.ambient_reflections: environmental reflections in product (windows | lights | surroundings)
reflections.specular_highlights: bright spots from lights on shiny surfaces

style_reference.aesthetic: premium studio gear | Apple-style minimalism | retro-tech | industrial | luxury | etc.
style_reference.photography_style: clean product photography | lifestyle | editorial | catalog | advertising
style_reference.mood: sophisticated | playful | serious | warm | cold | energetic | calm

mood: one sentence describing the emotional tone of the image
negative_prompt: things to avoid (comma-separated): poor lighting, blurry, cluttered background, oversaturated colors, lens distortion, toy-like, cheap plastic, unrealistic, etc.
